pullRequest.bodyText:
Rename platform-session-invalidator to platform-session-invalidator-api
Rename security-logout-service to security-servlet-logout-api
Rename security-servlet-web-socket to security-servlet-web-socket-api
Rename session-management-service to session-management-api
Refactor security features
What does this PR do?
Simplifies the security feature file. This change will make the feature file easier to understand and maintain.
Who is reviewing it?
@blen-desta
@garrettfreibott
How should this be tested?
See the tests steps on the Alliance branch.
What are the relevant tickets?
Fixes: #6166
Checklist:

 Documentation Updated
 Update / Add Threat Dragon models
 Update / Add Unit Tests
 Update / Add Integration Tests

Notes on Review Process
Please see Notes on Review Process for further guidance on requirements for merging and abbreviated reviews.

❓ (Question Mark) This comment is to gain a clearer understanding of design or code choices, clarification is required but action may not be necessary for approval.
